course.title: Market Design and Electronic Marketplaces
course.faculty_text: Peter Coles (Business School) and Benjamin Edelman (Business School)
course.description: Explores the theory and practice of market design, with prominent examples drawn from auctions, labor markets, prediction markets and kidney exchange. In this year's version of the course, we'll emphasize online markets, including online advertising, Internet infrastructure, and collecting and analyzing data from the web. The prerequisite is Game Theory.
course.notes: Open to undergraduates with permission of the instructors. Offered jointly with the Business School as 4150.
